First, thanks again to 737pilot (and team?) for another great update for us...everything installed perfectly iaw the provided instructions. Great job!!


I have a question, for clarity...

This torrent is a Terminal Chart update and not a NavData update...correct?

If so, with the torrent labelled '1203' instead of '03-2012,' it could be a bit confusing because it conflicts with Jepp's numbering method. Jepp NavData cycle 1203 won't be available to the public until Feb-28, with an Eff. Date of Mar-08, while Terminal Chart cycle 03-2012 was issued Feb-03 and is valid through Feb-16.

http://ww1.jeppesen.com/support/final/update-schedule.jsp


Just want maximum clarity for the end-user, I suppose, since there's no way, in-app, to verify what's actually installed, without checking for the presence (or absence) of specific procedures that are known to have been changed, using the Chart Change Notice. 

http://ww1.jeppesen.com/company/alerts/aviation-alerts.jsp

The team releases the torrent based on the availability of the terminal chart update, but it includes the most recently released enroute data and manuals.  This isn't really Navdata, so I'm not sure that the Navdata cycle numbering would be appropriate. Jepp updates the iPad enroute data on a two-week cycle, and sometimes more often (maybe to correct an error?).

It works perfectly, both PC and iPad.

Thanks a lot!!

@ icepilots - the reason the '1' appears is because there is an update available...

While this torrent is the most up-to-date available on tpb (as of the time of this post), terminal chart  cycle 04-2012 is now current, effective Feb 17.
I'm sure 737pilot (and crew) are working feverishly and will get us the latest asap.

Check the link below to remain aware of the current cycle:
http://ww1.jeppesen.com/support/final/update-schedule.jsp

For those who can't view enroute charts on Jepp FD. Simply rename /Enr to /Enroute on your iPad. IMO it will be more useful if this includes enroute frequencies. Nonetheless thanks 737pilot for the work! Kudos
